survey_name: AI-Powered Fitness App User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered fitness apps to understand their satisfaction levels, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your AI-powered fitness app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for readability. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How often do you use your AI-powered fitness app?

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in the app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an open-text option for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in the app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered recommendations provided by the app?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered recommendations provided by the app?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered fitness app?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows users to provide detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for meaningful responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered fitness app?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this AI-powered fitness app to others?
questions.client_notes: This single-choice question helps gauge overall satisfaction and likelihood of referral.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this AI-powered fitness app to others?
